11.content:
You wake up slowly, your head pounding with pain... You can't remember what happnened only that your in your home town and you were talking home from the mall when something hit you...

You look around and almost immidiatly your beautiful blue eyes shoot open in terror. All Around you people are running and screaming, Some naked and some in various states of dress, You than notice all around you people are being devoured alive. Some are being snatched up by monsters and dragged away into builidngs or Alley ways.. Frozen in place you le out a scream of terror over the havoc that's happening around you.

You are Mindy, a 23 year old college student with a beautiful body, though it is a little on the chubby side, that's never stopped you from seducing many a man into your bed. Your also not what people would call "Bright" Your not stupid, mind you, but tend to be a little bit of a ditz and veyr gullible. Your fully clothed (at the momment) and luckily today your wearing your running shoes.
You quickly grab a passerby and ask them what's going on. "What are you stupid lady? It's the apocolypse, These monster's are catching people, and either eating them alive or cooking them up for supper! Don't just stand there, Run!"

You take their advice and start running, But to where? Where could you b safe from this horror?!!

1113.content:
You look around for some place to hide, but ti's too late. You freeze in panic as you hear the monster stepping behind you. Slowly you turn around and come face to face with the ugliest creature you've ever seen, Standing around 8 feet tall with a huge protuding belly and nasty green, almost scaly skin, he reaches down for you and picks you up by your long hair. You struggle in pain as it sniffs you. "Mmmmm Me find girl. Girl easy catch. Make for good dinner." he pokes your belly. "Nice and plump. Will cook nicely. Me am lucky troll to catch you." You kick and scream as he binds your ankles and wrists and flings you over his shoulder. You kick and struggle as he walks off. "Me have several recipes. Me cook you up at camp. You cook nicley. Smell real good. Taste good too." Tears roll down your eyes as he tells you thes ehorrible things.

Hours later you reach the troll's camp. It's night fall and you've given up struggling. He rips off your clothing and flings you into a cage. "Me have get ready to cook yous. Yous be good and stay." He locks the cage and walks off laughing. You curl into a ball and cry... awaiting your fate
1113.title: Face to Face with a troll!

11131.content: It feels like more hours as you sit in your small cage crying when you hear the troll return. You look up to see him carrying firewood, a basket of berries and a large stick. He sets it all down and procceds to start a fire. "You cook real nice. Me make fire, roast yous over it. You roast nice. Be good and golden brown." You watch in horror as he manages to light the fire. "Mmmm Fire good and hot. You roast nice. Be nice and crunchy yet chewy." Your heart sinks as he gets up and walks over to your cage, opening it. All hope of escape and rescue sink as he grabs your by the hair and drags you kcikng and screaming to a small make shift table. He than procceds to bind your hands and feet to the large stick. "Mmmm These berries help with flavor. Make you tasty." He says and he smushes up the berries and rubs them all over your naked body. He than shoves a large apple in your mouth. "This help with noise. Make dinner lot quieter." He says as he begins to hold you over the fire, turning you slowly every now and than. All you can do is be roasted and cry, praying that death takes you before his feast so you won't have to feel those horrible teeth chowing down on your roasted flesh. You have to admit that the berries and your flesh cooking make for a good smell, but it sickens you that your thinking that way! Your being roasted alive dammit! You cry harder as your roasted to a golden brown and after a while you can't cry anymore. You can only stare into the fire and scream your self hoarse into the apple-gag. Finnaly he pulls you off the fire, but to your horror your still quite alive. "mmmm yu good and crispy now, nice golden brown and tasty." Witht hat he blows on you a little, which feels nice against your cooked skin, but than takes a bite out of your juicy ass. It doesn't hurt, but it isn't pleasent either. "mmm very tasty." He ays as he takes a swig from a large mug of what smells like rotten beer and contenuies to chow down on your flesh. As he reches your head, death finnaly claims you, nothing is left of you but a pile of bones he tosses into a corner, with the rest of his victems. With a loud belch he finishes his beer and lays down to sleep, licking his lips of the last of your flavor.
11131.title: Roast Mindy on a stick

1122.content:
The figure walks out...or rather..> Slithers out into view. "Oh, Well Hello there, little girl." You growl in anger. "I'm not little, I'm 23." It suddenly just hits you that this person is not a person at all, How could they be with such a long, blue scaled, snake like lowerbody slithering aroung ont he floor. Your eyes drawn to the tail you follow it up and notice it's upper body is that of a... very very handsome man with brilliant blue hair. He smiles at you and your oddly drawn to him . "What...What are you?" He chuckles. "Why my girl... I'm a naga. Half human half Snake, Name's Alan...And I'm... so very hungry...." You blink. "Well.. Maybe we can find you some food here in this Warehouse..>I'm kinda hungry myself"

the Nage slithers over you you lightning quick. "Ah but my dear it is so Ironic you would make such an offer." You blink unknowkingly. "Why... Why is that?" He chuckles again. "My dear, my kind, eats your kind." Quickly you jump away. "No...No way! I don't want to be food." You bolt for the exit, biut he slithers up and blocks it. "My dear... It won't be so bad... what's your name anyway..." You meakly answer, worried he might eat you alive any second. "Mi...Mindy." He nodds. "Alright Mindy, well I'm a fair person.. I'll tell you what I'll do. How bout we play... a little game." You nodd slowly "What kind of game?" "this is a very big warehouse. I'll close my eyes and count to 20, you run and hide, If I can't find you in 20 minutes, your free to go." You nodd again. "However! Should I catch you, You lose one article of clothing. Starting with your shoes, followed by your socks, than your shirt, Pants, Bra and panties. In that order." Your starting to not like where this game is headed... "These will count as... Your lives we'll say. Once you lose your panties, it's game over and I win. You give yourself to me willingly with no fuss... Though I do enjoy a good struggle... Do we have a deal?" He holds his hand out as if to shake....

info.brief_description: Do as the title says! Survive!
info.description:
You wake up to find your self in the middle of the city, The world has turned into a dark place indeed as all around you you see poor citizens being eaten alive or cooked alive by various creatures. You must Survive this...

Playable Characters:

Mindy, 23, Bisexual, mildly chubby but still beautiful, medium length brunnete. Mindy is quite the dish and any monster would be lucky too claim her. Naturally she doesn't want that to happen.

Chris, 25, Straight, Chris is a dark haired man who has great survival skills, problem is he's never encountered something that wants to eat him alive...

Alan: A male Naga with Blue scales, a strikingly handsome human half, long blue hair, and an unsatible appitite for human girls, Uses mind tricks, games and Hypnosis to seduce them into his belly.

Rules: Only Soft vore is allowed in terms of Vore. Cannibilsim is allowed but please keep it mild, not too many details. Same goes with sex. Please note that Chris and Mindy do not know each other (yet, but they can meet) and Alan does not eat men. Gay sex and Lesbianism are allowed with Chris and Mindy but Alan is straight.

Feel free to add chapters to Mindy's story. Please let me start Chris and Alan's before you add to them though. Also I'm aware of the typos in such. As time goes on I will go through and proofread
